"Feeling overwhelmed and hopeless, like I'll never be able to handle my life. It's like suicide is the only way out...but I know that's not the answer."

This post reflects a stable attributional style because it attributes the cause of the event (feeling overwhelmed and hopeless) to a chronic, long-lasting factor (the person's inability to handle their life). It implies that the person is naturally prone to feeling this way and that suicide is not a solution, but rather a result of their inherent limitations.
